name: Slay The Slimes: Post-Jam
description:
You wake up from napping on the cold dungeon floor to find slimes raining in from the ceiling. Quick, grab your dagger and fight them off!

--Controls--

 [A] and [D] or ARROW KEYS to move

[W] or [UP] to jump

[SPACE] or [LEFT CLICK] to attack.

--Joypad Controls--

[LEFT STICK] or [D-PAD] to move

[A] to jump

[RT] to attack

This is the post-jam version of the game with major tweaks and features that I didn't have time to impliment during the jam. You can find the jam version here: Slay The Slimes
